title: This is happening, stay alert.
selftext:
Targeting teens and college goers. 

The vagueness of thr replies makes me think the scammer is also a teen.
comments: Report to policee please and ban n report the account.Â

"And many more things to make a teenager addict"'

LMAO.
See his coverage...even escobar didn't have such range!
Not a teen here. Already done the basics.
The dealer is the real-life personification of "Source: Trust me, bro."

Any Handle with username starting with @@crypto is fake lmaoo

A few years ago i bought my weed in dark web stores. Honestly i was suprised, it was like a real  store where every seller had reviews and advertised themselves. Packages came from my continent and from out of continent and it worked out every time gladly. But it still didnt feel safe and paying in bitcoin is a hassle.
